titles.title: United States War Bonds Act of 2009
A bill to authorize the issuance of United States War Bonds to aid in funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 12/8/2009--Introduced. United States War Bonds Act of 2009 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to issue United States War Bonds to aid in the funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.
